languages.text: "В порядке? Я преисполнена горем, и гневом, и тоской. Но если я дам волю моим чувствам, я приманю Ее — ту, что уже опутала Лилэтан и, похоже, помутила рассудок тому, кто был призван вести мой народ".

traits.locale_text: "В порядке? Я преисполнена горем, и гневом, и тоской. Но если я дам волю моим чувствам, я приманю Ее — ту, что уже опутала Лилэтан и, похоже, помутила рассудок тому, кто был призван вести мой народ".

languages.text: "All right? I am overcome with grief, and anger, and anguish. But if I give free rein to my emotions, I will be drawing the thirst of She who has already entangled the Lilaethan, and, it seems, befuddled the mind of the one who was called to lead my kin."
languages.original_text: "В порядке? Я преисполнена горем, и гневом, и тоской. Но если я дам волю моим чувствам, я приманю Ее — ту, что уже опутала Лилэтан и, похоже, помутила рассудок тому, кто был призван вести мой народ".

traits.locale_text: "All right? I am overcome with grief, and anger, and anguish. But if I give free rein to my emotions, I will be imbibing It — the thing that has already entangled the Lilaethan, and, it seems, befuddled the mind of the one who was called to lead my kin."

"All right? I am overcome with grief, and anger, and anguish. But if I give free rein to my emotions, I will be imbibing It — the thing that has already entangled the Lilaethan, and, it seems, befuddled the mind of the one who was called to lead my kin."

"All right? I am overcome with grief, and anger, and anguish. But if I give free rein to my emotions, I will be imbibing It — the thing that has already entangled the Lilaethan, and, it seems, befuddled the mind of the one who was called to lead my kin."

"All right? I am overcome with grief, and anger, and anguish. But if I give free rein to my emotions, I will be imbibing It — the thing that has already entangled the Lilaethan, and, it seems, befuddled the mind of the one who was called to lead my kin."

languages.text: “我还好吗？我已经被悲伤、愤怒与苦恼压垮了，但如果我任由我的情绪信马由缰，我就会吸引饥渴女士的注意。它已经缠住了莉莱赞，而且似乎也迷惑了我的族人领袖的头脑。”
languages.original_text: "All right? I am overcome with grief, and anger, and anguish. But if I give free rein to my emotions, I will be drawing the thirst of She who has already entangled the Lilaethan, and, it seems, befuddled the mind of the one who was called to lead my kin."

traits.locale_text: “我还好吗？我已经被悲伤、愤怒与苦恼压垮了，但如果我任由我的情绪信马由缰，我就会吸引饥渴女士的注意。它已经缠住了莉莱赞，而且似乎也迷惑了我的族人领袖的头脑。”

languages.text: 「大丈夫か、だと？悲嘆と、憤怒と、苦痛に襲われているところだ。だが、感情を思うがままにさせておけば、既にリラエタンを絡め取ったあの女の渇きに引き寄せられていく。そして、おそらく、我が同胞を導くべき者と呼ばれた者の心もかき乱したと思われる」
languages.original_text: "All right? I am overcome with grief, and anger, and anguish. But if I give free rein to my emotions, I will be drawing the thirst of She who has already entangled the Lilaethan, and, it seems, befuddled the mind of the one who was called to lead my kin."

traits.locale_text: 「大丈夫か、だと？悲嘆と、憤怒と、苦痛に襲われているところだ。だが、感情を思うがままにさせておけば、既にリラエタンを絡め取ったあの女の渇きに引き寄せられていく。そして、おそらく、我が同胞を導くべき者と呼ばれた者の心もかき乱したと思われる」

languages.text: "Gut? Trauer und Wut und Schmerz überkommen mich. Aber wenn ich meinen Gefühlen nachgebe, ziehe ich den Durst von ihr an, die Lileath bereits umfangen hat und anscheinend den Geist der Person verwirrt, die berufen wurde, die Meinen anzuführen."
languages.original_text: "All right? I am overcome with grief, and anger, and anguish. But if I give free rein to my emotions, I will be drawing the thirst of She who has already entangled the Lilaethan, and, it seems, befuddled the mind of the one who was called to lead my kin."

traits.locale_text: "Gut? Trauer und Wut und Schmerz überkommen mich. Aber wenn ich meinen Gefühlen nachgebe, ziehe ich den Durst von ihr an, die Lileath bereits umfangen hat und anscheinend den Geist der Person verwirrt, die berufen wurde, die Meinen anzuführen."

languages.text: « Si je vais bien ? Je suis submergée par le chagrin, la colère et la douleur. Mais si je laisse libre cours à mes émotions, je risque d'attiser la soif de Celle qui s'est déjà emparée de la lilaethan et qui semble avoir brouillé l'esprit de celui qui devait guider mon peuple. »
languages.original_text: "All right? I am overcome with grief, and anger, and anguish. But if I give free rein to my emotions, I will be drawing the thirst of She who has already entangled the Lilaethan, and, it seems, befuddled the mind of the one who was called to lead my kin."

traits.locale_text: « Si je vais bien ? Je suis submergée par le chagrin, la colère et la douleur. Mais si je laisse libre cours à mes émotions, je risque d'attiser la soif de Celle qui s'est déjà emparée de la lilaethan et qui semble avoir brouillé l'esprit de celui qui devait guider mon peuple. »

languages.text: «¿Bien? La pena, la ira y la angustia me consumen, pero si doy rienda suelta a mis emociones, atraeré a la Sedienta, que ya ha enmarañado el Lilaethan y, al parecer, enturbiado la mente de aquel que estaba destinado a liderar a mi gente».
languages.original_text: "All right? I am overcome with grief, and anger, and anguish. But if I give free rein to my emotions, I will be drawing the thirst of She who has already entangled the Lilaethan, and, it seems, befuddled the mind of the one who was called to lead my kin."

traits.locale_text: «¿Bien? La pena, la ira y la angustia me consumen, pero si doy rienda suelta a mis emociones, atraeré a la Sedienta, que ya ha enmarañado el Lilaethan y, al parecer, enturbiado la mente de aquel que estaba destinado a liderar a mi gente».

languages.text: "İyi mi? Yasla, öfkeyle ve ızdırapla doluyum. Fakat duygularımı serbest bırakırsam da Lilaethan'la iç içe geçmiş olanın ve soydaşlarımın başında olması gerekenin zihnini bulandıranın susuzluğuna hedef olacağım."
languages.original_text: "All right? I am overcome with grief, and anger, and anguish. But if I give free rein to my emotions, I will be drawing the thirst of She who has already entangled the Lilaethan, and, it seems, befuddled the mind of the one who was called to lead my kin."

traits.locale_text: "İyi mi? Yasla, öfkeyle ve ızdırapla doluyum. Fakat duygularımı serbest bırakırsam da Lilaethan'la iç içe geçmiş olanın ve soydaşlarımın başında olması gerekenin zihnini bulandıranın susuzluğuna hedef olacağım."
